metadata.description: "Conforme à l'original envoyé par le Comité de salut public à l'Institut national de musique, pour être chanté à la fête du 20 prairial ..."--P. 3
The festival for which this music was composed took place on June 8, 1794. Cf. Pierre
Additional verses printed without music, p. 2-3
Variant of Martin & Walter. Révolution française, II, 10512
Pierre, C. Hymnes et chansons de la Révolution
